shortdesc.$: You can configure the appliance to meet your needs.
The basic settings depend on the features of your appliance.

p.$: Selection
Description
Set the current time.
The setting depends on the time format selected.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Set the time format.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Set the time display for the end of the programme.

$: shows the remaining time the programme has to run, e.g. 3h 25min.
shows the time when the programme will end, e.g. 15:20 hours.

p.$: See selection on the appliance.
Select the menu language.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Set the water hardness.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Set or switch off the amount of rinse aid to be dispensed.

link.@target: Setting the amount of rinse aid
link.$: Setting the amount of rinse aid

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Set the water sensor for identifying soiling.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

$: on or off for each operation.

p.$: The temperature is increased during the final rinse for a better drying result. This may increase the running time slightly.
Please take care with delicate tableware.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Set cold water or hot water connection.

Only set the appliance to hot water if this can be prepared with little energy and a suitable installation is available, e.g. solar heating system with circulation line. The water temperature should be at least 40 °C and max. 60 °C.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Switch EcoCheck on or off.
When selecting the programme, the average water consumption and energy consumption is briefly shown on the display.

variable.@variableName: Basic Settings - emotionLight: Über Hauptschalter aktivieren

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

variable.@variableName: Basic Settings - emotionLight: Ein bei Türöffnung

p.$: Switch the interior lighting of the appliance on or off.
When the appliance door is opened, the interior lighting switches off automatically after 10 minutes.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Switch the front display on or off.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

$: Set a default programme for when the appliance is switched on.

p.$: Scale with multiple levels.
Set the signal volume at the end of the programme.
Level 0 switches the signal tones off.
Scale with multiple levels
Set the button volume during operation.
Level 0 switches the button tones off.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Activate or deactivate automatic opening of the appliance door during the drying phase.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Switch the wireless network connection on or off.

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

variable.@variableName: Basic Settings - Remote Control Level: Dauerhaft

tooltip.$: Factory setting (may vary according to model)

p.$: Switch display of the brand name logo on or off when the appliance is switched on.
Restore changed settings to the factory settings.
The settings for initial start-up must be configured.
